scripts.telegram: node -e "const TelegramPolling = require('./services/telegramPolling'); const supabase = require('./lib/supabase'); const polling = new TelegramPolling(supabase, process.env.TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN); polling.startPolling();"
scripts.telegram-reseller: node -e "const ResellerTelegramPolling = require('./services/resellerTelegramPolling'); const supabase = require('./lib/supabase'); const polling = new ResellerTelegramPolling(supabase, process.env.TELEGRAM_RESELLER_BOT_TOKEN); polling.startPolling();"
